page.title: 14Going to Work
page.content: This area is mostly residential.3small industrial estates,1 with large DIY, supermarket and furniture retail ware- house.All 3 mainly small factories, warehousing,packing.Other sources of employment are local council,schools, HM Borstal,BRstation and many small offices,shops and other services.There is also easy access by road and rail to Southend,Basildon,London and other smaller towns.A survey was carried out on employment patterns.Questions asked were age,sex,type of work and district and questionnaires completed by 338 persons in the families of childen in our primary school.Ages range between 17and54.27\% are full time housewives; 19\% work in the Rayleigh area;29% work outside Rayleigh but within 10mls 19\% work more than 10mls away;4% work in several places.87% of men work out- side Rayleigh area, only 42% of women.
